comments.author: chofmann@gmail.com
comments.text:
brian krebs reports in tweet:

http://twitter.com/briankrebs/status/43741231179771904

"Silverlight plugin for Mozilla crashes almost consistently now when watching
Netflix movies > 1.5 hours"

we need to set up some endurance tests to check this out and any other
associated bugs of heavy browsing activity on netflix.

part of the meta bug to check out netflix in general.
comments.creator: chofmann@gmail.com
